titleStmt.title: The vvorks of Ioseph Hall Doctor in Diuinitie, and Deane of Worcester With a table newly added to the whole worke.
Works. Vol. 1
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
Lo., Ro.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Haviland, Miles Flesher, and John Beale] for Nath. Butter [, Thomas Pavier, Miles Flesher, John Haviland, George Winder, and Hanna Barret],

notesStmt.note: With numerous subsidiary title pages. Most have "printed for Thomas Pavier, Miles Flesher and Iohn Haviland. 1624" in imprint; some name John Haviland as printer; others name George Winder as publisher. "Haviland pr[inted]. A-Z, 2N-3L, and most of 4T-5I; Flesher did the rest except for Contemplations vol. 3 (bks. 9-11), which was pr[inted]. by Beale"--STC. Beale's section is missigned 4G-4M, and the subsidiary title pages have imprint ".. printed by Iohn Beale and [i.e. for] Nathaniel Butter. Ann. Dom. 1624.". Variant: Beale's section is a different setting, with signing partly corrected to 4G, 4O-4S and two subsidiary title pages dated 1625.
"Noah's doue .. printed by Iohn Hauiland for Hanna Barret, 1624", with separate pagination and register, is inserted after p. 468 (sometimes misnumbered 268).
Includes an index signed: Ro. Lo.
One of four imprint variants of this edition.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
